newsitem.title: UK: LIFFE coffee down, cocoa mixed, sugar off highs PM.
newsitem.headline: LIFFE coffee down, cocoa mixed, sugar off highs PM.

text.p: COFFEE - Nearbys still down, others steadier in late PM trade as NY slips on USDA report. March down $11 at $1,267 by 1556 GMT. COCOA - Narrowly mixed in razor-thin dealings as holiday lull begins. March off three at 917 stg. SUGAR - Drifts off highs following NY downward correction, trade thin as March holds above $300. Down $2.20 at $301.20.
